name: Virtual Guy Demo
description:
Virtual Guy is a challenging 2d platform game. 
You are trapped, and you won't be able to get out,
until you complete the journey.
You will have to go through several challenges to get 
your freedom.
Thanks for Playinh the Trial Version.
Appreciate feedbacks!
The game will be developed for mobile in the future.
Thanks for Pixel Frog: https://pixelfrog-assets.itch.io
